item.description:
Rico Barr and the Jump n Jive Review is New England's Premier Dance Band. The Band was Nominated as Swing Band of The Year by the National Swing Awards, but their repertoire includes the history of Dance music from the jazz and rock decades. They can be seen on the Concert Stage with their original compositions and arrangements and are in demand throughout New England and beyond.

Lessons at 8:00 - Music starts at 9:00

Admission; $16.00 - we will be getting a discount.
item.how_to_find_us: look for us at the front right side of the room. I'll put up some meetup signs.
item.name: Swing Dance with Rico Barr and the Jump 'N Jive Review
